message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. What do you think?
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can't go above $10,000.  What do you say?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $13,000. It's a fair price, considering the value it will bring to you. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm firm on my offer of $10,000.  If you're not able to go that low, I'm afraid I'll have to go with another seller.
